Reviews.Title: Great Service from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Ordered 1 and had a problem.  The TV had a purple vertical  line on left side.  Called Coby and they wanted me to pay freight and send it back.  I emailed Amazon and they sent a new TV and a pickup for defective TV.  Great service from Amazon

Reviews.Title: Good LED TV set for an affordable price
Reviews.Author: Denyse Roberts
Reviews.Content: I live in an arpartment building so this Coby LEDTV3916 39 inch television was perfect for my living room and fit nicely in my wall unit. The television was fairly easy to put together, for I did it all by myself. The T.V is not to heavy and fit sturdy on the base. The design of this T.V are smooth, sleek and  sharp with a super slim profile. The wide screen give you a wonderful viewing performance from all directions. The  backlight has a brilliant color and a contrast for a bright picture which is perfect. The picture quality is really good on this unit. The sound is not all that great on this T.V, but if you have a home theatre system you can enjoy the digital 5.2 surround sound. There is also a digital  HDMI connection, which I used to connect my T.V to my computer , so I can stream netflick from my computer to my television. I had to up grade my old cable box for a HD cable box and it makes a big differents. The picture color and quaility so much richer and bolder with both HD T.V and  HD cable box.Pros: Good price for such a big T.V, good picture, remote is very easy to use, design is sleek and thin.Cons: Volume could of been a little better.Overall I think the television is worth the money. If you're looking for an affordable television with great picture, well look no further, you have found it. You are getting 1080p for such low price,that is a steal. The only thing negative thing I would say about this T.V is that the sound could of been a little better. I know Coby brand is not as big as Samsung, Sony or Panasonic but I believe they did a good job on this television. I only have the unit for 1 month now, so I'll be doing up dates as time goes on.

Reviews.Title: wonderfull picture BUT
Reviews.Author: Albert I. Reiner
Reviews.Content: I sent one back as a space existed between top of screen and case. I did order a replacement, not refund as the quality of picture is excellent, It programed flawlessly when I used the HDMI cable. The replacement came and I'm glad I took replacement the picture is sharp,with many personal settings , I used a custom setting for the sound and may not hook it up to a stereo. MANY THANKS TO HELP GIVEN BY AMAZON TECH PERSON. They sent out replacement in a day.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Cleef Poincy
Reviews.Content: I just got the Tv in today and I was very impressed with the quality. The quality is Amazing!!! for the price and competes with higher end led televisions. I recommend the tv to anyone who is reluctant to buy it because of the brand.

Reviews.Title: Worked for 3 months and now half the screen dosnt work
Reviews.Author: Shannon Brown
Reviews.Content: I bought my tv in March and now the left half of my screen has vertical lines. I cant even watch tv. This is the second time  the tv has done this but somehow the first time it fixed itself and now after not using the tv for a day it is still broken. The tv was great until a day ago. Picture is crazy good and sound is so bad. This tv was my first flat screen and I loved it and now everytime I try to see if the lines have gone away I just get disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with this no name product, this is my 2nd Coby and extremely happy!!!
Reviews.Author: felix the cat
Reviews.Content: Good: Excellent picture, very easy set up, extremely useable friendly, plenty of USB ports (could have had more component or RCA connections or s-video), super light weight. Bad: I thought I would like how it sits up high on its pedestal but the problem with that is that you see all the cable connections underneath/behind the T.V.. Ugly: sound quality is not good unless you connect it to a stereo system, center sound-bar or some portable speakers.

Reviews.Title: value for money
Reviews.Author: feyisayo
Reviews.Content: Got this machine last week and so far no issue.Initially it was waving but when i used the HDMI cable,i got the real High definition,no waving on screen,pure sound quality and truely value for money.It can  be compared  with any more expensive LED HDTV in the market.I wonder why some people gave it star one,maybe they got the used one or the one supplied to them was faulty.For $309,my best buy for now,tanx AMAZON!

Reviews.Title: nice value in hard to find 39 inch set
Reviews.Author: Frank P.
Reviews.Content: I needed a set for a certain size armoire, and my choices under $500 were limited. This Coby set is not made by a top manufacturer, but it represents very good value and it serves my purpose well for a secondary TV. I've only had it for two months, but no problems so far. Nice quality, easy to set up and great value. Bought this on Amazon for $288 including shipping. The pictures on my Sharp and Toshiba LCD TVs may be sharper, but this Coby set works just fine for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a good price
Reviews.Author: Edward V. Ohalloran
Reviews.Content: Plugged it in and got a picture as good if not better than TVs I paid twice the price for. The discription on Amazon is lacking, read it and it suggest the TV only has one HDMI Port, it actually has four as well as many other options not listed.Have only used it for a few weeks and hope the best, purchase your Square Trade Warranty by email, they always run 30% off or better which is less expensive than purchasing through Amazon.I checked with Square Trade and on the Large 39" + TVs they do the repairs in home, however save the box if you have extra storage space, it will save you problems if you need to send it back. Both Amazon and Square Trade will send you a pre-paid UPS or USPS pick up slip.My opinion it's a good buy, although it seems some buyers got a Lemon, but that can happen no matter what brand you buy.Ed

Reviews.Title: tv works great, but customer service with cobyusa was attrocious
Reviews.Author: scott tomlin
Reviews.Content: Our 39"ledtv arrived just fine.  No problems with shipping, great picture, but we had problems hooking up our Bose surround sound system to this unit.  We called Cobys help line, and they were no help at all.  actually they were pretty rude, and were basically making fun of us that we couldnt figure it out.  We wound up going to best buy and they actually told us that we were needing to hook the system up through our dvr.  Come home , and in less than a minute it is all hooked up and working great.  Coby should be ashamed of themselves for how they treated us. The tv works great, but beware if you need help from customer service, because I dont think that you will get it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Coby LEDTV3916
Reviews.Author: J. Crow
Reviews.Content: Reasonably priced/sized LED TV w/decent sound. Not the super-thin LED profile like some leading brands. However, from a certain angle, it appears to be. This unit still has some body, so is able to include some acceptable speakers. Speakers face downward, which is not ideal, but sound fine in my case, with the TV mounted on a wall. An external audio system would  considerably boost sound quality (especially a subwoofer), but the speakers are fine for my needs right now.Picture quality is excellent!  I also love the simple remote control with well-positioned, easy-to-find buttons as I'm mostly using in the dark.  I've had the TV for about 3 weeks and very happy with it, so far.  I did notice it makes some clicking noises for a few seconds after I turn it off, but that might be normal and I'm not bothered by it.Package arrived from Amazon in great shape and ahead of schedule (I love Amazon Prime).  Unfortunately, the package did NOT  include any of the screws needed to mount the TV onto its stand! This would have been a huge problem if I wasn't mounting it on a wall. I called Coby support and they mailed me 3 of the 4 screws 2 weeks later. I had to call again to ask for the missing screw, which will take another 2 weeks. So far, that's my only disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Gary Rathjen
Reviews.Content: Received the TV a day early. Packaging was excellent. The only issue is the clock runs fast  but every other day I just reset it. Very slim design, great picture, sound is a little weak but I have it hooked to surround sound so no issue. I also use it as a computer monitor and it's excellent. Remote is simple and easy to use. The stand is sturdy and very easy to attach to the set. Do wish Coby would have added audio out RCA's but you can use the headphone jack on the TV. Big bang for the buck and I would recommend this TV to anyone on a budget. Kudos to Amazon and Electronic Express for excellent service.

Reviews.Title: Loved it!
Reviews.Author: Eric L Hubbard
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical of buying a television that was comparably significantly lower in price, but I was looking for an inexpensive LED or LCD TV for my daughter's new apartment; I wanted to avoid the huge price jump that comes with going over 32-inch screen size and Coby was one of only a couple in the price range I had in mind. I have to say that when we set it up and turned it on for the first time, I was astounded by the clarity and brightness of the picture! I did not expect the quality that Coby delivered- I was anticipating a similar picture to those cheap tv's on display at the end of the isle at a "big box" store, but the picture was much more "high end" in quality. The tv was easy to set up, the menu easy to navigate and overall I just thought it was a great bargain. My daughter continues to praise the quality of the TV, especially when used with a gaming system and streaming video.Amazon is such a great marketplace to find deals like this; the transaction was seamless and I had our purchase in hand days before it was scheduled to be delivered. I am completely satisfied with the entire purchase, from the TV to Amazon! I am seriously considering buying another one for myself!

Reviews.Title: So far a good TV
Reviews.Author: Julian
Reviews.Content: It's been only over a month since I bought the TV, and so far its been an excellent device. It completely worths the price. I only hope the tv doesn't cause me any knid of problem over the next months...

Reviews.Title: Was initially skeptical but am very happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Doon1
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these to hook up to my computer in an Eyefinity configuration. I won't bore you with the entire process; though I do want to tell you what settings I used because I was on the verge of sending them back. I used Blue Rigger DVI to HDMI cables (http://218.201.42.40:8080/www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005LJQO9G/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_3) and a HIS mini-display port adapter (http://218.201.42.40:8080/www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004RFGK30/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_2).In the TVs picture setting menu under screen size I chose "Dot By Dot" or I had a fuzzy picture with nearly illegible text.In the video card settings I had to make sure that the scaling option was set to "0" or the picture would not go to the edges of the screen.I'm writing this review on this computer sitting about 3 feet from the screens looking at a 5760x1080 panaramic view of the alps in summer. the colors are clear, the brightness is even, and the text is not even a little fuzzy. I was gaming on a LG 55" TV and I can say that this picture is it's equal.Hope this helps.John

Reviews.Title: Best looking 39" TV period.
Reviews.Author: Rich M821
Reviews.Content: The first shock is that the TV was so light, I could carry it with one hand. Was next to a Samsung and Toshiba, and it had the best picture to us, plus the lowest price. 3 HMDI inputs, LED/LCD 1080p didn't have to make any adjustments except the sound, was set surround (maybe I did it), and the commercials were loud, until I changed it to normal. Plus 80 stations over the air (I'm up high in NYC), Blu~Ray disc look great @ 1080i. Was going to buy it from here, but found a lower price near-by and got it the same day.

Reviews.Title: I'm happy
Reviews.Author: B.T.
Reviews.Content: The picture is good, nice size for the room and the sound is good. Anyone who says the sound isn't good needs a theater system, because I've never had it all the way up. Overall for the price it's a good deal. Blu-rays look awesome on it!-)

Reviews.Title: I like it and will not be replacing this for quite sometime.  Unless it breaks.  Then I might be screwed as Coby went under.
Reviews.Author: Darkness 42
Reviews.Content: Why I like it.Despite it's profile view it is extremely light.Decent speakers IMO so no need to bother with getting a speaker system.  (I use it as a monitor via hdmi)Since I extend my laptop display, it's nice that I can kill the screen (turn off backlight?) without turning off the tv.3 HDMI, 1 PC, 1 Component, 1 CompositeDUAL VOLTAGE!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Truly awesome!
Reviews.Author: LJ in PA
Reviews.Content: The quality of this TV for the price is truly amazing.  Plus, extra kudos to Amazon.  The one arrived with a cracked screen.  They delivered a new one, no questions asked, within 48 hours and picked up the broken one the very next day.  I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Great quality at a great price!
Reviews.Author: BBestvin
Reviews.Content: Are you kidding me with this deal?  I have a Panasonic Viera 50' Plasma TV in my main living room and I was looking for a good secondary TV to put in my lower living room area.  Now, if I was looking for an amazing, top of the line TV, I probably wouldn't go with the Coby, simply because it lacks alot of the bells and whistles that might be nice to have on your main TV.  However, Coby isn't marketing this TV in that way, so those weren't my expectations.I paid $300 for this LED TV, brand new from Amazon.  I will say, the quality of the picture is superb.  It rivals that of the "name-brand" units.  The audio leaves a bit to be desired, but it's nothing a sound bar or even a 2.1 surround sound unit can't fix.  I can't really think of any flat-screen TV that doesn't benefit greatly from additional sound hardware so that's not really a knock against the unit.If you are looking for quality TV on a budget, this is definitely a great deal.Sidenote: The TV makes a strange popping sound when it's turned off after being on for a while.  As far as I can tell, this happens with every unit so it's not something to be worried about.

Reviews.Title: Coby LEDTV3916
Reviews.Author: L. Lawson
Reviews.Content: This arrived faster then I thought it would in one piece and in perfect condition. Instructions were dummy proof. I bought this size to fit a small wall Unit and it is perfect, exactly the measurements it stated with breathing room for circulation. Setting it up was fast and within minutes I was watching TV with all of my sharp colors and the clarity settings ready and usable to get the perfect picture. Cable was easy to connect. The color is bright and sharp, although I found the sound a little low, once I hooked it through my own sound system that took care of that. I have no complaints about this TV at all. The price and value is there and it works, and the picture is sharp and clearer then the (other) name brand larger one I previously purchased that was much too large for that space. It was the best value I found and I'm still very happy with it. Plenty of connections in back for camera, computer etc.Though I never heard of this brand before, I was pleasantly surprised. I'd recommend it to anyone who wants a great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Cairney
Reviews.Content: It works great, great picture! We got it for our bedroom and it's perfect for the two of us in the room.

Reviews.Title: My new TV
Reviews.Author: Barbara K. Mallery
Reviews.Content: Since my old tv decided to start blinking like a disco light, I was more than glad to have one with a steady solid picture.  It has a great picture and was easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Coby LED TV 3916 39 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Drilling
Reviews.Content: The television has a good picture and good audio.  It was easy to set up.  Also Amazon had very fast delivery service  right to the house.  It was an excellent  television for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Aziza
Reviews.Content: Great quality television. It arrived very speedy. My only problem was that the speakers aren't very loud and I'm a gamer so at times this can be irritating. But i've hooked external speakers up with it and it's just perfect.

Reviews.Title: WE LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: betty j craft
Reviews.Content: Time will tell, but the picture is excellent..I would recommend it to anyone that wants a great TV for the money

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: luluview
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great . I love how clear and the colors are amazing. The only problem that I have is the audio is too low on some of the channels. I have tried the different programs for the audio, but it's still the same on some of the channels.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: Dani H
Reviews.Content: This tv was delivered a day early, so that was great.It is light and easy to put together.The picture quality is great; but like other reviews say, the sound SUCKS. So I had to get external speakers. Not a big deal, but just annoying.Also, there is only one panel of chord hookups, so I cannot plug in my cable box and my xbox at the same time. :/But, it does have an HDMI slot.Pros and Cons weigh each other out to make this a decent TV for the cheap price.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!!
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: Usually I like to know who made something before I buy it. This time,after reading other reviews and making product comparisons I couldn't find a reason NOT to buy this set. Was a gift to my child and she LOVES it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: RT
Reviews.Content: I received this tv a couple of days ago and I could not be more happy with it. The tv came in its original box unbroken and undamaged. The stand attaches quickly with a few screws and it is extremely easy to set up. I purchased a roku 3 and connected it through hdmi at 1080p and it looks amazing. I can not rate how well the blacks and colors look compared to other televisions because this is my first larger format LED tv. However, being a graphic designer, I am very happy with the color so far. The sound is alright, but not the greatest. I hooked up a surround sound system via standard headphone jack and it works great. Seriously, for the price and quality of this tv, there is no reason not to get one! I also got the squaretrade 3 year warranty for like $35.oo, so you really can't beat that either... Hope this tv works out for you as it has for me!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Anthony Sepulveda
Reviews.Content: Absolutely fantastic! This product is actually worth taking a look at. If you looking for a cost-effective HD television, definitely consider this TV as an option.

Reviews.Title: my second coby from amazon
Reviews.Author: happy amazoner
Reviews.Content: i have no complaints or problems, easy to set up and quite decent picture.once again buying from amazon means i can return it easily if it is not satisfactory.  I would never buy a tv this inexpensive in a store.

Reviews.Title: bought as gifts
Reviews.Author: J-man
Reviews.Content: bought 2 as gift give aways at the office and the recipients seem happythe price was right so hard to complain

Reviews.Title: Right size - right price
Reviews.Author: Interested
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and worked well out of the box. Price was right, and the 39" is just the right size, neither too big nor too small. I would recommend it based on my experience with it so far. Very good picture.

Reviews.Title: Coby 39-inch TV
Reviews.Author: C. Urbany
Reviews.Content: Great TV and well worth the money spent for a 39-inch LED TV.Great Picture Quality & Sound.Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Dan Kelly
Reviews.Content: Picture is great, TV is very lightweight, shipping was fast. I have had this TV in our bedroom for a little over a month and have not had any issues.  The sound isn't great but we are not watching movies in the bedroom, mainly TV shows and news.  I don't think very many of the LEDs have that great of sound. We have a 60 inch Sharp in our family room that I didn't like the sound either and purchased a sound bar for it.  I just think since the TV's are so thin the sound isn't good

Reviews.Title: L.E.D. HDTV
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: For the price of the TV I think it was a great deal. At first I had my doubts but after receiving my TV, I love it. 3 HDMI inputs, a PC input and component inputs really round it out. The picture is great and the sound is not that bad.  Overall definitely 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Brett Bjornsen
Reviews.Content: It's a solid TV for the price.  Good picture quality and plenty of inputs.  Blu-rays, DVDs, and Netflix streamed from my PC all look great.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about a week and haven't had any issues with it. The picture and sound seem great. It's lightweight and super easy to setup. I'll update this review if I ever have any problems with it. edit--I've had it for about four months and it still works great. I'm very happy I purchased this tv.

Reviews.Title: Insane Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Vic
Reviews.Content: First off, this is easily the best picture quality for a TV of this size. Excellent for sports in particular, picture is crisp with a number of options you can customize yourself. The only reason I am giving this TV four stars instead of five is the sound. Quality is good, but the TV is fairly quiet. My other TV is an Insignia 40" LCD flatscreen, and I only have that TV turned up to 20/100 when watching television. On this TV I find myself regularly cranking up the volume to 90 or 100 and wishing I could go further. There are two audio settings, simulated surround sound (which is just too quiet) and normal (lower quality), and I can't use the virtual surround sound because it is too soft. In short, audiophiles will be disappointed, but I was extremely happy overall (as picture quality was my #1 concern) and would buy this TV (or perhaps the 50inch) again.

Reviews.Title: Not able to add digital channels to channel lineup
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Fleetwood
Reviews.Content: Why do companies build products that do not do what they need to. Once you scan in the off air channels you cannot add anymore channels without erasing all the ones you have added. what a pain in the a#*! If you use a rotor as I do, this makes it impossible to get all the channels you want to watch without rescanning each and every time. The guide is total garbage also but that is not nearly as annoying as the scan problem. Otherwise the set performs well.

Reviews.Title: Flimsy packaging
Reviews.Author: Longhorn
Reviews.Content: I live overseas and had this shipped to an APO address.  I am not sure if the error occurred while in the US or en route to the final APO, but the television had a massive spiderweb crack on the screen.  The television needs much better packaging for long haul flights.  I might not recommend this particular brand for APO or DPO shipping.

Reviews.Title: Coby LED TV
Reviews.Author: BAReader
Reviews.Content: Beautiful HD TV that is very enjoyable to watch.  We can hardly pull ourselves away from it. Good value for the price!!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Doris Lee
Reviews.Content: Before purchasing this TV i read the reviews, the reviews ranged from 4 star to a 1 star.  One of the reviews was the TV delivered 'busted' or broken.  I took my chances and ordered anyway.  Surely my TV would not show up busted.  The odds were, it did, it took me over two hours plus calling my cable carrier to come to that conclusion.  I never got a picture.  It showed multicolors running together, no pic, no sounds. No batteries came with the remote, just very disappointing. The return was sweet, UPS picked it up within 2 days, funds returned... all thanks to a sympathetic customer service person.

Reviews.Title: Coby TV
Reviews.Author: kaji
Reviews.Content: Actually, my Mother purchased this TV, the only problem we have is that the sound is not good and so we use our stereo system instead.  :(

Reviews.Title: This model is 6 years old(2007)
Reviews.Author: Raymond
Reviews.Content: I had this television for about a hour after it was dropped off to my home and I decided to send it right back. In actuality the television is 35 inches not 39 the box it came in was 39 inches. Its also not digital ready you will need a conveter box to watch local television stations it was difficult to connect my laptop to it in the end I failed to do so.. I wasn't completely dissatisfied until I plugged my PlayStation 3 to it. And the  quality was just garbage they should recylce these models . Spend about a hundred dollars more for one 2012 models.  I have a Samsung 32 smart hub tv now and it is perfect picture and sound and very advanced connects straight to my wifi. I love it. Dont waste any more time reading my review go check a Samsung television.

Reviews.Title: JUST AS GOOD AS "BIG NAME" BRANDS
Reviews.Author: rocker8
Reviews.Content: I HAVE HAD 2 COBY LED TV"S. PEOPLE DONT KNOW THAT THEY ARE WASTING $100's WHEN THEY BUY THE BIG NAME BRANDS. NO MATTER THE BRAND 1080 IS 1080, AND 60 HZ IS 60 HZ. THE HD PICTURE ON THIS TV IS GREAT. I HAVE NO PROBLEM WITH THE SOUND AT ALL, LIKE OTHERS HAVE SAID. THIS MODEL HAS A VERY THIN BEZEL, AND THIN, SLICK LINES. I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMEND A COBY LED TV TO ANYONE. GET A TV WITH A GREAT HD PICTURE AND SAVE HUNDREDS.

Reviews.Title: Just try geeting any kind of support
Reviews.Author: KEVIN F. FEENEY
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my mother who misplaced the screws to mount it on a TV stand bracket.  I called technical support (887 302-2629) and all you get is "please visit our website www.cobyusa.com.  And when you go to the website it tells you to call.  No support of any kind.  So far the TV is working OK but I hope nothing goes wrong because I will not get any kind of support.Kevin Feeney

Reviews.Title: Overall Great  1080p TV For The Price, Audio has Tinny Sound
Reviews.Author: Stan
Reviews.Content: The Truth! My only reason I had bought this COBY 39" TV from local instead from any online. Because of abuse by UPS employees, they don't care. From local store, my filmy box has no crush and torn what so ever. Because of large the screen, is more likely to get damage than smaller screen. Last Sunday night, we had watched the Super Bowl on our local CBS channel with the cheapest rabbit ear antenna that was purchased from Dollar Store. For 4 full hour of Game, without any break up and drop out. This means; COBY TV has very good receiver for lower income people that they can't afford the Cable and Dish Service. The great receiver will help people get free TV from over the air. For 20 air miles from TV Tower to house in poor location for TV signal with very good picture quality. "You can't beat FREE!" Reason I ail not give 5 STAR because of weak and tinny audio. But audio is nice and clear for good walkie talkie class, that is very easy to understand. For music and big movies, it doesn't have it. I had plug in my headphone, too much of lack of shield static noise from jack to my headphone. COBY has said, you can hook up your PC computer. "VGA!" Is the old school of the 90's. Most of newer laptops has HDMI out plus Mac Mini & new Apple Laptops just came out with HDMI out. This COBY 39 inch TV has 3 HDMI ports. Because of this TV has only 60 Hertz, you will hardly see any refreshed distortion from 8 to 10 feet away from sofa to TV set. The computer monitors is only 60 Hertz. And by the way, I had watched from YouTube in full widescreen, from one of the best YouTube video without hardly any internet compression distortion in the 1080p, I say, "WOW!" Remember; 1080p is greater than 1080i from the Broadcast TV Stations. I really hope this reviews really help the public around the world. Number One is not tested: I'll keep my finger cross, 'how long will this TV last umber COBY brand?' The temperature on the back of this TV is very cool, but the only power supply has the small amount of heat. The Bottom Line: Less heat/longer lasting/fewer break-down. Last comment: You will see USB looks on top of HDMI is for SERVICE by Tech. professional. Good Luck

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Ramirez
Reviews.Content: I rarely take the time to post reviews on products.  Mostly because I've been fortunate to receive the products I order in good condition.  The first order I received for this TV, the screen was smashed in near the top.  I thought "oh well this happens".  Kudos to Amazon for the excellent service in returning the item.  So 6 days later I receive my replacement TV.  The first thing I did was to make sure it was undamaged as the first one was.  It appeared fine.  I powered on the TV, and sure enough the screen had lines all across it and midway down the right side it looked like it was hit with a softball (although it wasn't cracked).  Either Coby doesn't package their products securely enough, or the product is just not built well.  Bottom line is I returned this TV for a full refund rather than trying for a 3rd broken TV.  You get what you pay for at the end of the day.  If you go with Coby, get one in person and maybe you'll have better luck.

Reviews.Title: Coby has no customer service , stay away ...
Reviews.Author: gankaku99
Reviews.Content: Have a problem with my Coby TV , I email several time : no answer .Call them ,voice mail ...no callback .Stay away from COBY products .Cheap manufacturing .Poor picture quality  and awfull sound .No customer service at all .It not worth your money.

ProductInfo.Features:
Enjoy video in stunning high-resolution 1080p
Attractive super-slim profile fits anywhere - Energy efficient technology (standby power <1W)
Built-in digital TV tuner (ATSC/NTSC/QAM) - HDMI digital connection delivers perfect signal transmission
PC VGA connection for use as a computer monitor - Premium sound powered by SRS Labs
Digital noise reduction - V-chip parental control, Closed-Caption, and Electronic
ProductInfo.Name: Coby LEDTV3916 39-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
